import { useState } from 'react' import { RadioGroup } from '@headlessui/react' import { CheckCircleIcon, TrashIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const deliveryMethods = [ { id: 1, title: 'Standard', turnaround: '4–10 business days', price: '$5.00' }, { id: 2, title: 'Express', turnaround: '2–5 business days', price: '$16.00' }, ] const paymentMethods = [ { id: 'credit-card', title: 'Credit card' }, { id: 'paypal', title: 'PayPal' }, { id: 'etransfer', title: 'eTransfer' }, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function CheckoutPage() { const [selectedDeliveryMethod, setSelectedDeliveryMethod] = useState(deliveryMethods[0]) const [subtotal, setSubtotal] = useState(0); const [shipping, setShipping] = useState(0); const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart.value); return (
